posts.post_title: 1914 T213 Miller Huggins card with hands at mouth.  Sold
posts.post_content:
1914 T213 Miller Huggins card with hands at mouth.
This card is an SGC graded 20 Fair 1.5 Seems appropriate.
Has visible horizontal creases on front, not affecting picture.
Clean back. Nice color.
Nearly 100 years old, offered for $75 including shipping.
Email me [url]cubkmac32@aol.com[/url]
Thanks,
Ken

Ken, 
Thanks for the opportunity.
If its still available, I will take the Huggins card.
Please email or PM me with payment details:)

Brian, 

Card is yours.  PM sent for paypal info.  Will need snail mail address. 

Thanks, 

Ken
